website_summaries.verdict: In spite of the budget price, you get good quality and a satisfaction guarantee from the company.
pros: Rugged construction (including top-notch zippers), ample space, lightweight design
cons: Mesh sections aren't big enough to allow a good view of contents, but that's a small concern for these top-selling cubes

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend these cubes
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend these cubes. Not sure if I was unlucky and got a bad shipment but these cubes were ripped upon arrival. They arrived last night and as I started to pack for my trip, I noticed that there were several rips along the mesh. For a product that is so highly rated and expensive (these cubes aren’t cheap!) I expected more and am very disappointed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: tammie

customer_reviews.title: Great for one use -- and then the lining disintegrated :(
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these when we bought them last year and my kid used them at summer camp. Then we carefully hand-washed and air-dried them completely. So far, so good. What a nasty surprise, then, when I pulled them out of storage last night for this year's camp packing to realize that there is a coating on the inside that has deteriorated into a sticky, gummy MESS that will get all over every inch of clothing and everything else. I can't recommend them at all. Such a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Chandni

customer_reviews.title: One of the bags ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: It is only now that I have the chance to use this set as I'm leaving for a trip tomorrow. Just when I'm stuffing the biggest among the cubes, I noticed an opening above the zipper area. And I was surprised to see that it ripped. The cube isn't even so stuffed for it to rip. Also, I haven't been careless in stuffing my clothes so there couldn't be any fault on my part why it ripped. I don't have any time to return this product since I'm traveling soon.
customer_reviews.author: Village of Love

customer_reviews.title: one of the zippers broke on my wife's set while ...
customer_reviews.text: one of the zippers broke on my wife's set while we were at the beginning of the trip... the rest of the trip she had clothes spilling out all over the bag evertime we moved from hotel to hotel... dissapointing quality for the premium price
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: Jus tlike the photos
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Shacke Pak and Evatex Brands. Both look well made and sturdy. However, these packs are larger than the Evatex. I will use both and compare. These are 4" deep, most are about 3". Based on the size, I prefer these over the Evatex. There are no exposed cut ends in the material, as the seams are bound by a black material. Only time will tell if they are durable.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Shacke Pak is very light and works great, however
customer_reviews.text: Shacke Pak is very light and works great, however, it is not durable at all. After one time use of traveling through Asia, the big cube ripped. I'm not sure how other brands would fair. The packing cubes are wonderful but I wish they were more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Blk_Kodo

customer_reviews.title: Received used product! But seems good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive this as my boyfriend and I will be going on a month long trip to Brazil this August. I can tell that the quality is much better and thicker than the eagle creek compression ones we’ve bought earlier in the year but I was disappointed at how I received the item. I believe that I must have received a used item because I found small black hairs all over several cubes and a big white spot on one. It’s gross. I am hopping to return the product and exchange for a new one as the quality does seem worth the extra hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it less then one I would ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it less then one I would. I only received 3 of the 4 packs. I didn't return them because I had a trip to Chicago planned two days before I received them. On the way home one of the zippers broke. Very dissatisfied with this product I should have returned them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  used for backpacking through Europe.
customer_reviews.text: Love! However, the large and XL are very big. Next time I will buy just the medium and small pack instead. Shacke is a very good brand though, so whatever sizes you order, stick with them. I was very happy. Not sure if this helps, but I bought these for a backpacking through Europe. I have an Osprey Farpoint 40 and I could only fit either 2 mediums or 1 medium and 2 smalls. The large could kind of fit but it was bulky and not practice for what I needed to pack. Maybe the large would be good for jeans and jackets?
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Helps me Pack Lighter and Smaller, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've used these cubes for over a year now and they helped me pack lighter both for work trips as well as fun trips. I typically use the three smaller cubes and have packed for five day work trips with coats and ties as well as ten day leisure trips (though on that trip I took travel socks, underwear and t-shirts and washed them in the sink while there.) Recently I had a problem with one of the cubes and Shacke customer service took care of it quickly and courteously. With both a quality product and helpful customer service I join the other thousands of customers giving this a five star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Espresso J

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: Read amazing online reviews regarding this brand, and I was very excited to try it out. However, it ended up being a very disappointing set of packing cubes, most likely because of the quality. Does it burn has a string and most of the strings came off on the first use. The match is not persistent, and after a three day trip on low to medium use, it ended up breaking apart. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these packing cubes for a trip I'm taking in May. So, while I can't give a comprehensive review, I can say that upon initial inspection, this product looks like it's made of a strong, durable material. This item doesn't look cheap at all. I've never used packing cubes; indeed, I didn't know such items existed. Since my trip includes various forms of transportation, I decided to see if my clothes will travel better. So, once my trip has concluded, I will be in a better position to give a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Helpful packing aid
customer_reviews.text: Although I travel often, I'd never used packing cubes. But I was going to attempt a 3-week trip in Europe (including some professional obligations) with a carry-on suitcase, and I hoped these would help. They did. I like the variety of sizes included and that fact that, empty, they require almost no storage space. They helped keep my clothes neat when I moved from place to place often without unpacking, and my clothing remained in good condition. They add virtually no weight to my suitcase. I'll definitely be using these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: dephal

customer_reviews.title: One cube came apart
customer_reviews.text: Received the packing cubes a couple of days before my trip to the Mediterranean. As I was packing, one of the medium size cubes started coming apart as I zipped it closed, and it was not even full. Other than the poor quality of one of the cubes, I do think the cubes helped me pack more items and keep them organized during my 9 day trip. If I had time I would have exchanged them, so disappointed that I have to have one repaired.
customer_reviews.author: April Porter

customer_reviews.title: Make unpacking at hotel much less cluttered.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these and we now use them when we travel. It makes packing and unpacking much faster and easier. We separate our clothes into individual bags and then place them in our suitcase. Then when we get to the hotel we just set each bag in the hotel dresser drawers and when we go to leave just zip them back up and repacking is much easier. Works great. Even recommended them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: More like L, XL, XXL, and 4X in size
customer_reviews.text: They seem great. There's just 2 changes I'd make to what I got. (1) I guess I don't pack heavy, since the two largest essentially don't even fit in my carry on. Not sure what I'd ever use those for, maybe to store sweaters or blankets under my bed? (2) I wish there was a handle on two sides, so you could pack these in taller "bucket" bags either long side down or short side down, and yet still have something to grab to pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to the old days
customer_reviews.text: I will always use these from now on. Any big trip, you don’t have to completely unpack, they all work as there own “drawers”. I separated and organized different pieces of clothing in each and you can’t definitely fit more in your luggage with these. They’re especially great for long trips where you will be going to several locations for just a couple days each.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Zipper pills broken, mesh torn at seems - and we a were so easy on them
customer_reviews.text: 09/25/17 Poor construction. We just returned from our trip using these cubes. We did not over stuff them, and we went easy on their use. Mesh ripped apart at the seem on one bag. I lost two zipper pulls. My wife lost a zipper pull. These are poor quality and not worth the few dollars saved - we regret the purchase. Vendor: we would not be interested in a new set. Can we just return these for a refund? We purchased two sets and only took a few cubes on the trip so we have several that were never used.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: This is my fourth purchase of the same product
customer_reviews.text: I am a frequent traveler and several years ago, I was introduced to Shacke's packing cubes which was a novel concept in packing. My first purchase was the black color packing cubes. Over the years, I have purchased purple, blue and recently green cubes. so now I have Shacke's packing cube in four colors. Not only can I pack neatly in the cubes but I can color code my items for easy unpacking and use. The last time I was traveling, I used black cubes for personal items such as clothes, purple cubes for general items I would need, blue for family gifts, and green cubes for other items. This color coding of packing cubes works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jones

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than most - seem well made
customer_reviews.text: I find this kind of product really useful for longer trips. This set feels well made, though using heavier materials than others I have had for awhile. The extra weight hurts when luggage total weight can now include the weight of these - which is in addition to the clothes they contain. The second ding is that they don't compress. The better versions of this kind of product include the capacity to fill the bag, then use a fine zipper that compresses the whole bag to a thinner size. This greatly helps packing. If they used strong, but lighter material, it would more than cover the cost of a light zipper to facilitate the compression.
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: These packing aids are great.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. I used the paks for a recent vacation that involved air travel. So there was the usual 50 pound weight limit. The paks helped me organize my clothing, so that everything fit more neatly, with like items packed with like items. Prior to traveling, I was easily able to find items to eliminate from the suitcase, to lighten the load. And when I got to my destination, I left most of my clothes in the paks. That made it easier and faster to dress each day. I also I could easily see how many clean things were left. These paks are awesome. Next time, I'm buying a few more to supplement the original set.
customer_reviews.author: Book-lovin' Granny

customer_reviews.title: Love packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set of cubes. As others in the family like them too, I found some had "disappeared" when I went to use them so had to buy a few more. I find them to be so helpful in packing (keeping organized). I like different sizes too. Keep different items in each one and then just grab cube I need (dresses, tops, workout clothes etc). Highly recommend getting them for travel.
customer_reviews.author: xnycer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. Material felt cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t find these to be helpful in traveling. If you were traveling and staying in one place for several nights and unpack it might work for you. When I travel, I tend to move around and trying to pack and unpack these is a pain. I do think you can pack more stuff but the time to do so is just not worth it. Pack less stuff and spend more time on vacation and less time in your room packing and unpacking these cubes. I can still travel for two weeks with a carryon without these things. I do also realize these were less expensive that other similar products, but I felt the product seemed cheap and pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in stains but they are nice!
customer_reviews.text: First, packing cubes are a game changer for me. No more searching my suitcase for things. I bought 2 sets. I thought it was nice that these came with a laundry bag, it’s partly why I picked this brand over some of the others. However the laundry bag is too small. It will only hold enough clothes to handle just one of the larger cubes worth of clothes. And the one in this set had what looks like bleach stains all over it. The colors are pretty awesome and the cubes are pretty sturdy. Plus they hold a decievingly larger amount of clothes than I expected ( but I did cram them full).
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize just how large these bags were. So large that defeats a purpose of having. I roll my clothes when I pack so these bags can fit weeks of clothing. I don’t see point of having these bags since clothes will just get tossed around and unravel. Pay attention to size of these bags or you’ll end up with useless bags like I did.
customer_reviews.author: white_lilac

customer_reviews.title: Small Luggage Pack
customer_reviews.text: I bought another of the same brand/set in a larger size. I found that this pack fits normal carry-on rolling suitcase with ease and a little extra room. Perfect for short trips. These bags can fit more items in a suitcase than if packing without (tetris-style). The material is lightweight, protects items, is easy to remove/replace in the bag, keeps things organized, compresses air from clothes, and I found is nice to protect shoes from getting scratched. The only thing I'd think about with dress shoes or protecting from scratches is this brand has mesh, which if everything isn't secured in a bag, may result in a scratch. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Great organizers
customer_reviews.text: For organizing purposes, I was able to use the small one for my carry on with a change of clothes. Perfect size. The ones in my suitcase held 'cold gear', 'dinner wear' and 'daytime wear', so I only had to use one at a time, instead of going thru an entire piece of luggage searching. These worked as organizers, but I really don't think they helped with minimizing the space needed for a suitcase. I was packing a 29" suitcase, and using the cubes, I could fit less in my bag using the cubes, than without them.
customer_reviews.author: selective shopper

customer_reviews.title: The variety of sizes and the accompanying card with packing recommendations are very good. I have looked at a variety of web ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reading reviews about packing cubes before choosing the Shacke product. I have not used the extensively because I only recently received them. I have tried them out and feel I can say they are well made and allow you to see what they contain. I believe they do compress items. The variety of sizes and the accompanying card with packing recommendations are very good. I have looked at a variety of web sites too that offer helpful tips on folding clothes to maximize space and avoid wrinkles. I wish more dealt with men's clothing. Packing shoes diminishes the usable space of a carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lamberta

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a packing cube
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a packing cube. However, a brief soak in water (hand washed) due to a slight spill in my luggage resulted in a lot of sticky residue coming off each, which took a lot of scrubbing to get rid of. Not sure if this was a defect in the product, as what spilled was not sticky, or whether it will happen after any first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a one month trip to Europe, and couldn't be happier. The quality is good and they are a great way to organize your clothes. I left everything in them and put them in drawers or closet shelves. I put shirts rolled up in the large one, pants rolled in the next size down. I used the small one for miscellaneous little things. They all fit in my suitcase just fine, and I packed other things around them. Wish I had them for all my previous trips.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H

customer_reviews.title: I'm a convert.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking there was about a 50/50 chance I would end up giving them away to a relative, but I tried them once and now I'm a packing cube convert. Don't know how I went for so long without using these, they are so convenient! I use them to pack a carry-on roller bag for business trips. The small one for underwear and socks, the medium one for oxford shirts, t-shirts, and thin sweaters, and the large one for pants and heavier sweatshirts or jackets. I don't use the extra large one for business trips, but will use it for extended (two-week) vacation trips.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Best use of suitcase space ever!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these yet, but they were the set that got the highest marks in a high-end travel blog. Every seasoned traveler I have spoken to says packing cubes are absolutely essential....even though you might think not. They all thought they were not necessary, but once they used them they will never travel without them. I guess the main feature is not having to dig through all your clothes to find something. If all underware is in one cube you don't have to disturb the other cubes; simply pull out that cube and toss it back when done.
customer_reviews.author: MauiSunny

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy here. Just a simple, quality product. Includes a small bag, 2 mediums, 1 large, and a laundry bag. I am in the process of moving and I simplified my packing with these bags. They will help keep everything organized so its easily accessible while definitely making moving them easier. Each bag even comes with a handle for easy carrying. Just a great product for what I wanted them for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W

customer_reviews.title: Don't like them
customer_reviews.text: Don't really like them, went by all these great reviews and I'm disappointed. I use Eagle Creek, needed extra ones but didn't want to pay as much so spend ages looking for alternative. The largest one is HUGE, probably won't use it. The main negative is the material, I like the super light Eagle creek and these are kind of stiff and just not as good at all. My husband never uses the cubes but on our Europe trip I gave spare ones from both brands to him, and he pretty much only used the eagle creek and refunded me with these:-(
customer_reviews.author: S. Tomankova

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much I bought more!
customer_reviews.text: After watching many reviews on packing cubes I bought this set for an Alaskan cruise last year. It was almost always the #1 or #2 ranked for cruisers. I now use them every time I travel anywhere. They keep me organized and all of my clothes clean. I am not someone that unpacks in hotels so having these cubes is crucial to know where every item is. I no longer hunt through the depths of my suitcase trying to find something that shifted during travel. I loved them so much I bought a set for my mom so she could benefit from them too.
customer_reviews.author: MissingAZ

customer_reviews.title: What did I do before packing cubes?!?
customer_reviews.text: From someone who travels weekly—Love these! I have now bought them for everyone in my family plus a few others as gifts. Packing has never been the same! In fact, I tell everyone about my Shacke Pak cubes and how they are awesome for traveling—get to the hotel and simply open the cube, fold the top back and stick it right in the drawer! Easy to re-pack when leaving because you simply take it out of the drawer and close it up! I like the fact that it comes with the dirty clothes bag (which I have also used for shoes). Only thing—I wish they were sold in a larger bundle-4 isn’t enough.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L.

customer_reviews.title: Tidy and organised in a duffel bag. Really convenient. Easy access to gear.
customer_reviews.text: We've recently switched to travelling with duffel/backpacks. In the past, it's been hard to get clothes to stay neatly rolled up and hard to work out who's gear was whose. We just took a 4 day trip with these packing cubes. Used "papa bear, mama bear and baby bear" sized cubes for each of us. Used the smallest one to pack our raincoats. Made getting to our clothes very accessible. Also when we had to store the bag in a locker storage, we could just take out the packing cubes, shove the duffel bag into the locker and put the cubes in there on top of it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I’m now a believer in packing cubes! I frequently travel for work and I’m gone about 5 days at a time. I have never been able to pack everything in a carry-on before, requiring me to spend $$$ to check a bag. I bought these right before a trip to San Francisco and was able to fit 5 pairs of pants, 5 shirts, pajamas, and socks all into one packing cube (the biggest one in the 4 piece package). I was able to put it in my carry-on and still have room for shoes and toiletries!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I really like how there's not a ton of structure
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to hold off on this review until I had taken a trip with them. I can now say that they work extremely well. i'm using them in my backpack as I travel around Thailand for 3 weeks. I really like how there's not a ton of structure, which means you can roll it up to save space/ make them fit in small places. The only thing I would change with them would be to switch out the large size with another medium, as i'm only using a 1/3 of the large space (I have the rest just rolled up on itself)
customer_reviews.author: Blake Leach

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cubes for organizing your luggage
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these packing cubes for the first time, on a 16-day trip. On day 4, I am very pleased with how organized my suitcase can be with these packing cubes. The biggest one is for jackets and sweaters, next biggest for slacks/shorts/skirts, and the next biggest for t-shirts and tops. The smallest is for my carry-on bag. One entire change of clothing fit into the smallest bag! (roll everything!) And I was very glad, because the airline lost my luggage for one day, and I was pleased to have a change of clothes with me. Quality of the cube fabric, zippers and overall construction is good.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Magic Packages.  Buy them now, buy them for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: The “wrinkle free” part is only because that really depends on how you fold your clothes, but we took these to Grand Cayman and my gf and I got both outlets things into the same suitcase. We travel a lot and that has never happened until now. I was an instant convert and am buying some for the kids, who also share a suitcase. You, know, when we can travel again. These make it so much easier, more compact...I am a chronic overpacker and my gf isn’t much better than I am. All. In. One. Suitcase. Magic packages is what these are.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, well made packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are excellent. They are light, well made, and very efficient. I can easily see through the webbing to see what I have packed inside. I recently used them in packing my backpack for a 3 day weekend trip. Having no place to unpack my stuff and being in cramped quarters with others was not a problem, as I could keep all my stuff in my backpack, keep it organized, and quickly find the clothes I wanted when I needed them. I just wish I had gotten the set of 5 because I find the medium and small bags the most useful, especially the medium.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I read about these cubes in a travel article and had to try it. I am a chronic over packer but using these cubes helped me. I got 2 of the 4 packs and 4 pack of mediums. That was more than enough to pack my family of 5 for a 7 day trip. I had several cubes left over. It was extremely easy to find clothes (I rolled my clothing) and to repack for the way home. First time ever I was able to get all our clothes and shoes into a big suitcase and a carry-on. Highly recommend these cubes!
customer_reviews.author: D Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Made packing and unpacking super easy; was able to pack a lot of clothes in distinct groups.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a recent 9 day trip and it was fantastic. It really helped me organize clothing into clear groups. It helped in quick packing and unpacking. The other unexpected benefit was that I moved worn/soiled clothes into one of the bags ~2-3 days into the trip. That way clean clothes were separated from worn clothes. Loved it and will use it on all trips.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these right before my trip to Greece. Wished I would have found them sooner. These bags were a God-send. Everything organized. There are four bags in different sizes and a laundry bag. The smallest one I used for my cosmetics, toothbrush, contact fluid, etc. The biggest one was for pants and a couple of dresses. You roll up your clothes and put them in. Everything orderly. The medium one was used for shirts, bathing suite and cover up. The next size was used for underwear. They fit nicely in a 26 inch suitcase. You will love them and wonder why it took you so long to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 sets in different colors for my husband and myself. This made packing more organized and so easy. No digging through the suitcase to find things. We just put the cubes in the drawers when we arrived. Packing was more compact and we were able to share one large suitcase for a 10 day trip. Will be ordering these for family members to use! No issues after first trip with zippers or anything else with the product.
customer_reviews.author: lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Look larger that they actually are
customer_reviews.text: These are ridiculously small. Slacks jeans etc wont fit unless you roll your underwear it wouldnt fit either. Not happy they appear much larger giving to my grandbaby her clothes will fit.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Danger - may cause overpacking...but it will be organized!
customer_reviews.text: I have friends who have long sung the praises of packing cubes but I didn't think it would make that much of a difference. I was wrong. These things allowed me to fit 10 tops, 1 jumper, 3 jeans, 1 denim skirt, 2 bathing suits, 2 pajama pants, 2 bras, 1 kimono, 8 pair of underwear, 3 pair of sandals and a light weight windbreaker all in a standard rolling carry on. Did I overpack? 100%! But it was all organized and unwrinkled and I'm now a convert. Oh, and those friends I mentioned? They paid a great deal more for their popular brand name cubes and the quality and assortment of this set is on par.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize your belongings!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several positive reviews, I decided to give these a try. I bought 3 sets for my family and I for our trip to AZ last week. They kept us organized and we all thought that it was easy to locate articles of clothing too. We each packed them as such- the largest cube with rolled up pants, second largest, shirts etc. Having the cubes left the whole other side of the suitcase for other loose items. The extra bag, (which houses all of the cubes when you’re ready to put away) was great for laundry or extra items (shoes, etc). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Really well made
customer_reviews.text: Just packed up for our first trip using these packing cubes. They feel really well made. The zippers and stitching are heavy duty. The sizes are perfect for nesting into the suitcases. I packed one set into my roll aboard and a second set into a large sized checked bag. They fit both perfectly with little or no room to move around. The packing videos on the website are not very helpful. The company should consider making their own instead of using random you-tubers. I feel like some packing and folding advice would be good with these things. Will update after our trip (7 days and two hotel changes) if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: B_D

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I was able to pack so many clothes in these cubes. I don't know how I lived without them. You will not be disappointed. By these now. In these four packing cubes, I packed one pair of jeans, 2 pair of pants, 4 blouses, 8 dresses, three bathing suits, one bathing suit cover up, 3 pairs of shorts, 5 t-shirts, 15 pairs of underwear, 7 pairs of socks, 6 bras, one skirt, 5 tank tops, 1 Blazer, one pair of pajama bottoms, 1 bath robe, and 1 blue jean jacket. It all fit!!! Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: LisaWade

customer_reviews.title: Stress on Mesh Around Edges
customer_reviews.text: These are really handy packing cubes and the right sizes for all types of travel. I use them now almost exclusively - even for an overnight trip. My one complaint - really more of a design flaw - is that on the second-to-largest cube, the mesh on one of the edges started to rip and is now a fairly sizeable hole. I have not used a different brand of packing cubes, but I would think that having less mesh around the stress points would be better. Other than that, I like having the handle on the non-zipper side of the cube.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: 15 days international in a carryon
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give 4/5 is because the four cubes don’t fit like a puzzle into a carry on. You really have to squish to get them to fit, and you have awkward space left over. However, I packed for an international educational tour (meaning different clothes each day and some dress outfits) in my carryon. If you fold your clothes into them carefully, you can get a lot in and keep it pretty wrinkle free. I just used them again for traveling for the holidays and I got about 10 days worth of winter clothes in my carryon. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Keeps travel organized!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to stay organized while traveling! I keep my pants/shorts/skirts in one, tops in another, workout wear/swimsuits/pajamas in another and socks/undergarments in the fourth. Take each one out of your luggage & place them directly into the hotel drawers & you keep it together! Also, my luggage is always so jammed full this helped to save room. Finally, when security goes through my luggage everything doesn’t fall out as soon as they unzip my suitcase! Should have bought sooner!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Changed my packing life
customer_reviews.text: How did I not know about packing cubes years ago??? I'm telling you, these will change your life. Everything fits easily, and when you arrive at your destination you can stay organized even if you're living out of a suitcase. LOVE IT. This product is sturdy and has strong zippers that I'm sure will stand up to lots of use. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: A must.
customer_reviews.text: This product is wow wonderful. If you have never traveled with packing cubes you will be in for one organized surprise! From fitting everything in to keeping organized with every nights stop this is a must have. I had my doubts but they disappeared once I packed them and the ease of pulling out my pouch with my night stuff each stop then repacking that pouch and pulling the day clothes pouch out. No more rummaging thru my luggage trying to find black socks or whatever, these are a mandatory must!
customer_reviews.author: dtcp

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I am the type of person who tends to overpack 99% of the time. These packing cubes made my trip so much easier since I didn’t have to rummage through my luggage to look for a certain shirt or pant since I was able to pack them in different cubes. It kept everything so nice and organized. I even had left over room in my suitcase for any additional items like souvenirs or an extra pair of shoes. It also made unpacking a thousand times less stressful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: These really do save you space!
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe how much easier it was to pack with these! They really do help you conserve space! I was really amazed on the trip home. I used them to pre-sort my dirty laundry and was shocked by how much I could wedge into each cube--especially since I wasn't worried about wrinkles! It made it possible for us to add the heavy jackets we had purchased to our current luggage without having to buy an additional suitcase for the trip home. I'm convinced that with more experience I could pack even more efficiently on my next trip! I can't wait to use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Historychick

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Travel!
customer_reviews.text: I will never travel without these again! We were traveling two weeks in Europe with children and was trying to minimize what we took and the bulk of it. I ordered a different color for each of my three children which also helped to differentiate their clothes in the suitcase. It's amazing what you can put in these. I also ordered the Ebags but honestly I preferred this much more!
customer_reviews.author: CKSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Great packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: I have had absolutely no problems with the Shacke Pak. I love that you can get them in different colors. It is very easy to see your clothing through the screen. After watching several You-tune videos I learned how to pack using these, and was able to overstuff with no problems! For me, the largest cube in this set is a bit too big. I like the medium sizes the best. I do not have another packing cube to compare this to but am happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built set of packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: I’m planning to use these in the next couple weeks. They seem well built and the company appears eager to quickly address any issues we might encounter. I’m confident they will be a useful change to how I pack. 2/20/19 - I’ve been using these for about 10 days now and love them! They have held up remarkably well despite being pulled out and opened and closed repeatedly and shuffled. It’s nice not to have to dig through clothes to find things. The bag they come in is also useful for storing dirty clothes. I’d highly recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Nova

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Investment
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait to buy these packing cubes? They made my recent trip a breeze. Fit perfectly in my suitcase allowing clothes to breathe yet not shift around during transit. I managed to fit more in my suitcase than I could have without them. Nothing was wrinkled and everything stayed organized. It was easy to find what I wanted in my suitcase after arrival. Transferred shirts and pants to the closet hangers and back when the hotels didn't have dressers. Would have been very easy to slide into drawers. Buying more for gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: FoxRun

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Fits Alot
customer_reviews.text: First time using packing cubes. I usually travel with a hiking backpack. The pack I have is top loading which makes it annoying to find things. I used the small, medium and large packing cube for a 2 week trip to Europe. It's surprising how much you can fit into each cube. This is a game changer for when I travel now. The packs were durable and breathable because of the mesh. This is a solid product with good quality zippers also. I'll update the review for future to see how long these last.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anyone - even those who pack lightly
customer_reviews.text: Really makes a difference, even for those who already roll their clothes and pack lightly. I figured since I roll my clothes, I wouldn't get much benefit from this. Then had to fly with an airline that allowed almost nothing for carry on, used one of these inside bag, rolled my clothes to put in the cube, and cut the size of my luggage by half. It's amazing. Zippers seem as though they will last, and has a lifetime warranty on it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmine

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must for traveling. You can fit so much more and it’s nice to be able to separate your clothes for different purposes if you need to. My husband and I used them our trip to Hawaii and one day we didn’t know if we were going to need our swimsuits because we were going zip-lining and hiking but we just used one of the smaller packing bags and put our swim stuff in and it fit easily into our backpack and we were ready with it just in case. So it saves so much room in your luggage but also is nice for a bag for a change of clothes when you’re going on an outing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: These had been sitting in my wish list for quite some time, and I just bought them this week for a short trip. I use a soft duffel for a carryon bag, and dislike not being able to easily find that pair of socks, for instance, when I want to. I have packed for this trip using several of the zipper packs and really like the organization that is gives me. Shirts all neatly folded in one, tee shirts in another and socks and undies in yet another.
customer_reviews.author: Vtboarder

customer_reviews.title: Super-light, well-made, functional and attractive
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are Super-light, well-made, functional and attractive. They are flexible yet have a welcome element of structure to them that makes packing them into a bag easier and more space-efficient. They are well-packaged, come with a helpful packing guide and a useful laundry bag. Proud of this purchase, especially at the price!
customer_reviews.author: larnole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product, fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. We are new users of packing cubes, but we are very pleased with our three Shacke Pak purchases. One was defective (out of 13 cubes purchased in three sets) and Shacke is replacing it free of charge, with no need for us to ship back the defective cube. Can’t ask for better than that - good quality product, multiple size options, fantastic customer service, and reasonable prices. Not to mention the free shipping with amazon prime. Five stars for Shacke Pak packing cubes!
customer_reviews.author: mom2hokies

customer_reviews.title: I'm a packing cube convert
customer_reviews.text: I read many different reviews prior to purchase and I'm so glad I went with this brand. They are clean (no weird smells), easy to see inside (but not flimsy) and it's nice that they come with a little laundry bag. They make packing so much easier. It's so great to be able to divide your clothes ahead of time. You don't have to go searching through the whole suitcase when you need something. You can have a cube for underwear, a cube for t-shirts, a cube for dressy clothes, etc... Rather than mess up your carefully packed suitcase - you can just pull out the cube you need.
customer_reviews.author: taylor315

customer_reviews.title: My favorite travel accessory
customer_reviews.text: I travel frequently and travel light. My luggage is usually limited to a backpack that slides under the airline seat. For a two week European cruise I added a carryon rolling suitcase. I've used these packing cubes twice so far and I am hooked. One cube holds everything (including clothing) I take on a 3 night trip. The cube slides into my pack saving massive amounts of room, and everything is easy to find during travel and at hotel. Taking out one cube and unzipping is much better than digging through a pack! I will never leave home without these!
customer_reviews.author: Gura

customer_reviews.title: Travel made easy - finally!
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are awesome! I've never used cubes before but OMG are they the best thing EVER for traveling. We went on a 2 week trip to Australia and were always on the go. Thank god I had these things to keep things organized and together. It was super easy to find everything I needed and to pack everything, especially when we didn't have a lot of time so I could just throw them into the suitcase and go. I'm an orgnizational freak and I think these are a must. For big trips, I would recommend even buying 2 sets, but I think most people could do it with one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and capacity
customer_reviews.text: I have used these once so far and love it. It feels really durable and can hold a lot! in the largest size, I fit 4 long jeans, 4dresses, 3 shirts, 2 shorts and there was still some space on the sides. The smallest size i used for a change of clothes for myself and both children including a few diapers in my carry on. Even though I packed them as tight as i could, once zipped it did not feel as though it would burst nor was it bulky. i would definitely recommend these to anyone who likes to have their travel bags organised.
customer_reviews.author: ElleH

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe in these things. I thought they were dumb, but they're actually very helpful in organizing your clothes and other travel items in your bag. They're especially helpful if TSA or customs asks you to open up your luggage. Your stuff isn't flying all over the place and you're not stressing out or having an anxiety attack. I'd recommend trying to buy the smaller cubes separately as well, especially if you're a carry-on type of traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Will always use these cubes when traveling!
customer_reviews.text: We love these packing cubes. It is the first time we have used packing cubes and it has been a great experience. We rolled all our clothes and put them in the cubes. The cubes do a great job of maximizing space by pushing your rolled clothes together. When we got to the hotel we simply unzippered the cubes and put them in the drawers. It has kept everything neat and organized and easy to view. We used the two large cubes from each set and got everything we needed into our carryon luggage. The product seems to be well made. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Repeat order!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered from Shacke through Amazon. The bright colors are a benefit when looking into a dark suitcase. My first sets were rectangular; this last set was square, so I should be covered for all possibilities. I ordered different colors for us. When we fly we put our cubes in different bags in case luggage is lost. I like the netting on the corners for breathability and so you can tell what is inside. The cubes keep items from moving around in your bag which reduces wrinkles. I also like putting smaller items (like underwear) in the cubes to keep them together. Unpacking is quicker as well. Don't know how I got along without these!
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Mac

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought them a long time ago.
customer_reviews.text: I just packed for a 6 day trip where I need business clothes, weekend clothes, evening casual clothes and workout clothes. I was able to get everything in the 4 cubes which has made my packing so much easier. I packed a week early and now they cubes are packed and ready to put into my suitcase when I am ready to go. I wish I had bought this a long time ago for the MANY years I have traveled for business. I am getting ready to leave for a 10 day overseas trip and the cubes will be a huge improvement for my packing.
customer_reviews.author: iamdls

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I know about these sooner?
customer_reviews.text: After reading recommendations about using packing cubes for long travel trips I bought this set. We used them on a 2 week trip. Yes! They do help! They allow you to pack a lot more into your bag and they help organize your stuff. They are sturdy, easy to use and look like they will last. I have used them now on 4 different trips and love them. They make so much sense i doubt I will travel even short trips without them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kollasch

customer_reviews.title: At last, a well-organized suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: I used the packing cubes for the first time on a recent 10-day trip. I was pleased at how lightweight they are and how they kept everything well organized in my suitcase. The cubes were great for underwear and socks, as well as my wrinkle-resistant clothing, which I rolled up (as per the instructive video). My wrinkle-prone items did not fare as well, and I will go back to my usual way of packing those articles. That said, I will pack with the cubes on all future trips.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this item didn't seem to save room in my suitcase. This was the reason I purchased these cubes ... So for now I'll just use them for organizing items in my suitcase & try harder to pack better. I do love the bag that holds all the cubes. I will use this for my coat when going on trips ... instead of getting dirty while on the plane, in the airport or while at my destination. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing; will never pack without them again
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical about these cubes but used them for a recent trip to italy as we were trying to pack as lightly and space management friendly as possible. I tend to overpack but was able to get everything into 3 out of the 4 cubes and my husband used the 4th for socks and underwear. The carrying case worked well as a laundry bag as well and when we returned everything was so wrinkle free that the few items I didn't wear were able to be rehung as if they were never packed!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kennel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE FOR TRAVELING!
customer_reviews.text: This are one of the best travel items I've ever used. We travel a lot and sometimes jump to different locations (countries/cities/climates) during a single trip. I've used these for packing clothes for each location or climate zone. I love that they have mesh that allows clothes to breath and are see through so I know which pouch is holding which items. I picked up a set of these for my husband and our son too - each having their own colors so if we unpack at a location, we know whose is whose. Can't say enough great things about these!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: One of my packs ripped after the first time I ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my packs ripped after the first time I packed it. And I did not overpack as I had a 60L backpack and in total only weighed about 20lbs... I had filled out the warranty, emailed them, sent a photo, etc - they got back to me same day and I came home from traveling to a new pack in my mail. These were a MUST for packing my backpack and living out of it for a month. Planning on buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The additional laundry bag was wonderful to separate the dirty laundry from the clean laundry
customer_reviews.text: Just used these for the first time and they made traveling so much easier!! I was able to pack everything I needed for a 4-day vacation into a large backpack. I used the smallest cube for toiletries, which came in handy to have everything in one convenient bag. I also was able to compactly pack a bath towel and other bathroom essentials into the large cube, in addition to putting my other clothes in the second-largest cube. The additional laundry bag was wonderful to separate the dirty laundry from the clean laundry. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ACM

customer_reviews.title: They are washable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I loved how they are sized. Good choice for packing. I was able to get most of my clothes in the bags. The sac will be good for storing my soiled clothes in. I was a bit disappointed with the color (warm red). The picture made them appear a darker red. Also, the design on the picture was deceiving for me. I thought the cubes had the design as well as opposed to being all red with black net. None the less, I intend to order another set but in a different color. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about the need for packing cubes but now I am a believer. My husband and I shared a suitcase on a recent trip and I was SO much more organized using cubes for my things. I knew exactly where everything was - socks and underwear all in one cube, shirts and pants in another, sweater and scarves in another, and I used the small one for my toiletries. In the past my things would be all over the suitcase, some clothes folded and stacked, some rolled and tucked. Now I can still fold and roll as needed, but everything remains organized. Such a time saver! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing suitcases, especially for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 yo son, as we were going on a 12 day cruise and needed to pack quite a bit. While one set was too small to hold my own clothes, these were perfect for him. I put shirts in one, pants and shorts in another, socks and underwear together, and so on. It made it easy for him to find his clothes without making a colossal mess of his suitcase. They are great for adults too of course, depending on the size and quantity of clothing you are taking. For a long weekend trip, these would be perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Katie F.

customer_reviews.title: Best way to organize your packing
customer_reviews.text: This makes packing for travel so much easier. It helps keep your clothes organized, especially if you're packing for multiple people (like your kids), and makes your clothes easier to find so you are not digging through clothes to find what you need. It also makes unpacking so simple. Just grab a pack and place it in a drawer and you're all set, it's that simple. The product seems durable and appears to be made with high quality materials. I also love the bright color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Tim (achebee4you)

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes have made traveling so much less stressful. They're high quality, easy to pack, and help me keep things organized when we travel by plane or when we go camping for the weekend. I have two sets in different colors to differentiate my husband's clothes and mine. I'm the kind of person whose suitcase seems to explode when we arrive at a destination, and I used to have to root around to find things. Now everything is nicely organized by pants/skirts/shorts, shirts, and undergarments. I can easily remove the items for the day and keep everything else in place. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: LittleTPot

customer_reviews.title: Family packing made easy
customer_reviews.text: I love these cubes. We have different colors for each person in our family. They keep the suitcase organized and everyone's clothes separate. They can hold a ton of clothes rolled up. I used the biggest size to hold all of my clothes for a 7 day cruise for a total of 11 days all together. I have had these stuffed to the brim and the seams are holding up great. All the different sizes make this a great purchase because they accommodate different trip lengths. I wish I would have bought these much sooner because we travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: T McKinzie

customer_reviews.title: Practical, durable, essential
customer_reviews.text: We have used these packing cubes for every single trip since we got it (5 trips in just a couple months). They are extremely durable and hold a lot of items without compromising the integrity of the zipper or material. I particularly like the variability in bags sizes and the laundry bag! It’s so ideal because unlike hotel laundry plastic bags that rip with the slightest stretch, these are durable and can also be used for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Isquared

customer_reviews.title: What a great travel accessory to have !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome I used it on several cruises and they are great to keep things organized and to store them in the cabin and just pull them out and unzip when I need something I seen this product on cruise tips TV and enjoy it quite a bit I should’ve gotten more of the packing cubes but would highly recommend them for travelers as I would recommend them to family members these packing cubes are tough durable and I liked it they come in different colors and sizes
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Paired it with the Osprey Porter Travel backpack for a trip to Europe. It made it very easy to pack and unpack and find things. For the idiots who dont read the instructions, do not put this in the dryer, it will melt.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't travel much, maybe once a year, so wasn't sure packing cubes were something I needed. But packing for an upcoming trip with the family, I thought I would give them a shot. The Shacke Pak set seems to be high quality. The sizes are convenient and they really do make packing more efficient. Just when you think they are full, you zipper them up and see that there is still room for a few more things. I also like the convenience of being able to open my suitcase without everything tumbling out. Great Value! I have already recommended them to a few friends who have purchased them and are equally as happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a Christmas present for my dad, who travels a lot during the year. He loved it! He commented that he likes that the laundry bag is included, as some packing cubes don't come with an additional laundry bag. The cubes seem to be very durable and can be laid very flat when they are empty, which I thought was nice. At first, I didn't like that you can see through the cubes, but now I realize that it's helpful to know what all you have in each cube! Overall fantastic quality for the price and I feel like he will use them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: MFrossard

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am traveling soon and I used these to pack in. I think they will hold up well and I think they will be very helpful in keeping things organized especially if you are moving around more than once. These helped me stay so organized and it was really easy to stay neat especially when sharing a small hotel room with someone else. I was able to organize my stuff in them so that I would take them out when setting up my outfit for the next day and then put them all away once I was done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stupid
customer_reviews.text: I packed everything in my carry-on, into 4 of these cubes, and couldn't close the carry-on. Unpacked the cubes into the carry on, and had room for more. These would be great for organization, separating shirts from shorts, etc. But it's def not helping me fit everything in need into my carry-on. Inefficient for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Meesha

customer_reviews.title: Packing Cubes are the ONLY way to travel!
customer_reviews.text: A good friend turned me onto "packing cubes." (She's now been upgraded to a bestie!) I wasn't entirely convinced until she did a demonstration on packing for an upcoming trip. I immediately ordered two sets (red for me, blue for my husband), since I thought ShackePak would be the best value (they are!) I was amazed at how many items I could fit into each cube, how organized it kept our clothes and how they could easily be arranged in our suitcases. Going forward, we will ONLY travel using packing cubes from now on! Now our clothes can be easily identified as his or mine.
customer_reviews.author: Barefootmom

customer_reviews.title: This is going to change how I travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Some of the reviews mentioned the netting had separated from the seams. Yeah, I don't think so, not from the product I received. It's very well put together in my estimation. Some mentioned they only received 3 out of 4 pieces. I received all 4 pieces. I ordered two packages of these totaling 8 pieces, and I received them all. Imagine that!. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Practical and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of improving and simplifying my travel, especially with all the new regulations on air travel. I love purple and am not always happy with the "grape" and "mauve" colors that call themselves purple. This is purple. :) And they will be of great use to me in business travel, which I believe will be happening more often in the future. Of course I'm also hoping for some non business travel - like to Europe - which will be wonderful if I can pack better.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Made packing easier!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a week long vacation and I really liked them. It was so much easier to have all my items organized into these packs as opposed to digging through everything all together in my suitcase. I knew right where ever thing was. Socks in one, shirts in another, etc. I rolled some items (shirts) and laid flat and folded others. Worked great with both methods.The quality is very good. I have already ordered a second set to give as a gift to my sister for an upcoming trip she is going on. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Roling

product_meta.title: Shacke Pak - 5 Set Packing Cubes - Travel Organizers with Laundry Bag
product_meta.description:
Pack More Clothes in a Small Space For Your Next Trip

One of the toughest things to do while packing for a trip is fitting everything you want to bring with you into your luggage. Our packing cube system fixes that issue by neatly packing all your clothes tightly into our space saving bags. It allows you to easily store and organize your clothing that makes it easy to pack and even easier to unpack. Your clothes will stay more wrinkled free and not get crushed during your travels. We’ve included a laundry bag with your cube set so that you can separate your dirty clothing from your fresh clothes on your journey back home.

Shacke Pak is made with a high quality durable water resistant nylon material built to withstand the wear and tears of travel. It is reinforced with a X-Design web stitching made specifically to prevent the fabric from folding in the middle, allowing for a more secure packing experience. Our bags are 4 inch deep giving you enough space to pack more clothing. Finally, we use high quality zippers for a smooth and sturdy use. 

Shacke Pak Overview: 5pcs Total

- 4 Packing Cubes -Extra Large( 17.5" x 12.75" x 4") Large (13.75" x 12.75" x 4") Medium (13.75x9.75x4) Small (11" x 6.75" x 4")
- Laundry Bag for storing dirty clothes at the end of your travels


How to care for your packing cubes: 
- Hand washing cubes is the best way to ensure the cubes do not get damaged 
- Wash only with cold water 
- Hang dry only 
- DO NOT put the cubes in the washing machine, even if it is on gentle or delicate cycle 
- DO NOT put fabric conditioner of any kind






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :1.5 x 13.5 x 17 inches; 1.15 Pounds
 * Item model number :4sp-00004
 * Date First Available :December 16, 2014
 * ASIN :B00R280UZ8

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #5,214 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #5 inTravel Packing Organizers 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars10,344 ratings 

Pack More Clothes in a Small Space For Your Next Trip

One of the toughest things to do while packing for a trip is fitting everything you want to bring with you into your luggage. Our packing cube system fixes that issue by neatly packing all your clothes tightly into our space saving bags. It allows you to easily store and organize your clothing that makes it easy to pack and even easier to unpack. Your clothes will stay more wrinkled free and not get crushed during your travels. We’ve included a laundry bag with your cube set so that you can separate your dirty clothing from your fresh clothes on your journey back home.

Shacke Pak is made with a high quality durable water resistant nylon material built to withstand the wear and tears of travel. It is reinforced with a X-Design web stitching made specifically to prevent the fabric from folding in the middle, allowing for a more secure packing experience. Our bags are 4 inch deep giving you enough space to pack more clothing. Finally, we use high quality zippers for a smooth and sturdy use. 

Shacke Pak Overview: 5pcs Total

- 4 Packing Cubes -Extra Large( 17.5" x 12.75" x 4") Large (13.75" x 12.75" x 4") Medium (13.75x9.75x4) Small (11" x 6.75" x 4")
- Laundry Bag for storing dirty clothes at the end of your travels


How to care for your packing cubes: 
- Hand washing cubes is the best way to ensure the cubes do not get damaged 
- Wash only with cold water 
- Hang dry only 
- DO NOT put the cubes in the washing machine, even if it is on gentle or delicate cycle 
- DO NOT put fabric conditioner of any kind
feature_bullets: Made From High Quality Water Resistant Nylon Material to Withstand the Wear and Tear of Traveling
5pcs Total: 4 Packing Cubes - Extra Large (17.5" x 12.75" x 4") - Large (13.75" x 12.75" x 4") - Medium (13.75x9.75x4) - Small (11" x 6.75" x 4") - Laundry Bag (21" x 14.75")
X Design with Double Stitching – Creates a Strong Reinforced Lid to Hold Your Clothes in Place and Prevents the Bag Material in the Middle to Fold Upwards.
4 inch Deep Design Allows You to Fit All The Clothes You Need into Our Bags
Laundry Bag Included to Help Separate your Dirty Clothes At The End of The Trip
